mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS board_no, TITLE AS title, B_CONTENT AS b_content, TO_CHAR(B_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS b_date, CUSTOMER_ID AS customer_id FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO AS board_no, TITLE AS title, B_CONTENT AS b_content, TO_CHAR(B_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS b_date, CUSTOMER_ID AS customer_id FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_DATE, CUSTOMER_ID) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{b_content}, SYSDATE, #{customer_id})
